content.raw:
He was [trying to check](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-any_to_any-abichecker-utopic-amd64/1/parameters/) `gazebo_4.1` against the tag `gazebo4_4.1.2`, but there was a mercurial problem cloning the tag and then checking it out.

I think comparing `gazebo_4.1.3_changelog` against `gazebo_4.1` isn't what we want. We want to compare the current `gazebo_4.1` branch against a previous tag.
content.html:
He was trying to check gazebo_4.1 against the tag gazebo4_4.1.2, but there was a mercurial problem cloning the tag and then checking it out.

I think comparing gazebo_4.1.3_changelog against gazebo_4.1 isn't what we want. We want to compare the current gazebo_4.1 branch against a previous tag.
